reviews.review_msg: REALLY UNCLEAR INSTRUCTIONS ON EVERYTHING.This course became my first F in my 3 years at SFU. Honestly, her marking scheme is so weird, if you don't use peer-reviewed articles, you will receive a big fat 0 on your final paper. But she did not provide any way of looking for these "peer-reviewed articles." I really wished I did not taken this class..

Worst prof ive seen within my 4 years at SFU. Unclear instructions of assignments and papers. Way too much effort needed for an 1st year course. I've spent more time on this course than my 300/400 courses, and i came out with F,just cuz i didn't use "peer reviewed" articles (there is no way of finding them on internet at all). DONT TAKE THIS CLASS
